section.title: Setting Display Settings
section.para: You can set your own themes, colors, and time zone for the console. These settings are specific to the logged on user.

step.para: Navigate to ConfigureMy Settings, then click on the Visual tab.
Make selections from Display Settings for the following items.

listitem.para: Use Chart Theme to select a group of colors and font sizes specifically for charts.
Use Time Zone to select the time zone in which to display the console.

note.para: Note that in time zones where clocks are set forward for daylight savings time, the time zone correctly displays as EDT (Eastern Daylight Time) in the console. When the clocks are set back, it correctly displays as EST (Eastern Standard Time).

listitem.para: Use Locale to select the language in which to display the console.
